en.title: National Economic Account: 2022
en.description: Annual national economic accounts, covering the current account (production, generation of income, use of income) and capital account.
en.description_email: DOSM has just released the latest national economics accounts, covering the current account (production, generation of income, use of income) and capital account.

bm.title: Akaun Ekonomi Negara: 2022
bm.description: Akaun ekonomi negara tahunan, merangkumi akaun semasa (pengeluaran, penjanaan pendapatan, penggunaan pendapatan) serta akaun modal.
bm.description_email: DOSM telah menerbitkan akaun ekonomi negara tahunan terkini, merangkumi akaun semasa (pengeluaran, penjanaan pendapatan, penggunaan pendapatan) dan akaun modal.
